FuncDef: This command adds a static multicast group either as a (*, g) or as one or more (s,g) records. When a static IGMP group is added, multicast data for that (*,g) or (s,g) is forwarded to the specific SAP or SDP without receiving any membership report from a host.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IGMP multicast group address that receives data on an interface. The IP address must be unique for each static group.
